name: Mute
greetingText: I really like your name btw!. To be honest, I want to know you more deeply—let me take that risk.
wishText: At first glimpse of your gaze, I tumbled into its depths—an endless abyss where time dissolves. Now, my soul whispers to dwell eternally in the universe cradled within your irises, where every glance is a constellation and every blink a fleeting eternity.
